description:
Replacing the injured Gonenzaka, Jack duels alongside Yuuya! Their well-coordinated tactics begin the counterattack! Seeing the Battle Beasts gradually driven back, Sanders suddenly jumps into the Duel!! Jack and Yuuya trust each other as they fight together, while Sanders and the Battle Beasts use power to control others. How will this tag duel end?!
Source: crunchyroll
